QuestData.Title: Where They Least Expect It
QuestData.Description:
The Legion's fanatical crusade leaves them spread thin. As they focus their defenses on Argus, we are free to tear into their forces on other worlds.
Travel through an Invasion Point on Argus and show the Legion that there is no hiding from death.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter an Invasion Point and defeat a Legion Commander.
QuestData.RewardText: So many Legion worlds are ripe for the taking...
